shared.find-partner: YOU ARE IN NEED OF FORMING A PARTNERSHIP TO
shared.find-partner-sub-2: Upgrade, change or update technology for existing systems.
shared.find-partner-sub-3: Build, manage, operate a private team on request, located at TCOM.
shared.find-partner-sub-4: Hire TCOM’s staff who’s willing to work directly at your company office.
shared.find-partner-slogan: We are ready to connect with you!

service.labor-line-1: You can build and manage a dedicated team with qualified resources at TCOM to work exclusively for your project.
service.labor-line-2: Labor guarantees stable human resources. You can choose to be present or absent at TCOM.
service.project-based-line-1: The contract is signed for each project.
service.project-based-line-2: The team and all project development activities from documentation of requirements, technical architecture, UI design, programming, testing, deployment and support are managed by TCOM.
service.onsite-line-1: TCOM’s team, which includes a fixed number of members, work directly at your offices for a specified period.
